div.p: For all intents and purposes at the request of the person concerned declares that Lucilene da Luz Mota, Degree Student in Tourism, daughter of Felipe Hilário Mota and Eremita Perpetual da Luz Mota, bearer of Identity Card No. 219588, issued on 19.05.2014 by the National Archives of Civil and Criminal identification of São Vicente, born on 21.03.1990, a native of São Vicente, attended the 4th year of that course in the academic year 2014/2015.
